rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, up to two target creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
Whenever you attack with exactly two creatures, you may exile two cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life for each noncreature card exiled this way. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control for each creature card exiled this way.
